name: mm-autocomplete
description: A fully-styled dropdown list containing multiple options.

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Default text which appears on the dropdown button ('Select One').

attributes.name: overflow
attributes.description: Allows long list items to overflow when the list is opened.

attributes.name: overflowWidth
attributes.description: If set, will adjust the overflow container's width in pixels. Otherwise use the internal item width

attributes.name: maxitems
attributes.description: The maximum viewable number of items to display in the list, others will be hidden and wil incur scrolling.

attributes.name: fitparent
attributes.description: Instructs the component to fit to its parent container's width (percent or pixel width).

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Close dropdown if it is open, otherwise open it.

methods.name: bindModel
methods.description: Bind a property on the given model to the input's value.

arguments.name: model
arguments.description: The model object to update with value changes.  If the model has a '.set()' method, .set(property, inputValue) will be used (otherwise the property field of the model will be assigned directly).

arguments.name: property
arguments.description: The property on the model that should be bound to the input's value.

properties.name: data
properties.description: Array of value / label objects for data-driven dropdown (eg. [{value: '0', label:'Item Label'}, ...]). Setting this will override any internal mm-list-items.

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: Default text which appears on the dropdown button ('Select').

properties.name: value
properties.description: The current value of the selected item.

properties.name: maxItems
properties.description: The maximum number of items the dropdown will show before scrolling is enabled (zero and null indicate 'unlimited').

properties.name: state
properties.description: The state of the dropdown (may be 'opened' or 'closed').

properties.name: fit
properties.description: Whether or not the dropdown should scale itself to fit the width of it's parent.

properties.name: error
properties.description: Triggers the display of invalid visual state.

detail.name: value
detail.description: Value of the selected item, usually it's label
